I'm still paying off my student loans, so I don't own a home yet.
I'm a creative person who enjoys using my imagination to create new things.
i want to put my photos to a music video staring adam levin.
My garden is my most prized possession.

content.text: What do you like to do to relax?
I like to spend time in my garden. It is my most prized possession.
What kind of plants do you have?
I have a lot of different plants. I like to grow flowers, fruits, and vegetables.
That sounds really nice. I have always wanted to grow my own food.
It is a lot of fun and it is rewarding to be able to eat fresh, healthy food.
I bet. What kind of fruits and vegetables do you grow?
I grow a lot of different fruits and vegetables. I have tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, squash, zucchini, carrots, and potatoes.
Wow, that is a lot of plants! I bet you have a lot of work to do in your garden.
It is a lot of work, but it is worth it. I love being able to grow my own food.
I am sure your family loves it too.
They do. They love eating the fresh fruits and vegetables.
That is great. I am glad you enjoy gardening.
Me too. It is a great hobby.
